info: The proposed investment project will support the Government of Indonesia in the development of the Java–Bali power transmission network for meeting future power demand in Bali while improving the long-term power supply security and efficiency of the Java–Bali power grid. The project will (i) develop the electricity transmission infrastructure by constructing 220 kilometers (km) of extra high voltage (500 kV) transmission lines with capacity to transmit 1,500 megawatts (MW) of power; (ii) develop 500/150 kV and 150/20 kV substations in Bali and Java; and (iii) support project management.
name: JAVA-BALI 500-KILOVOLT POWER TRANSMISSION CROSSING PROJECT
